trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.

An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.

To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.

To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> returns.

Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
Returns information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.

A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData"></xref> that provides information about the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.

To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> returns.

Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
